instruction: Research and cite 3 examples of medicinal plants commonly used in traditional medicine.
output:
1. Aloe vera - traditionally used for skin care and wound healing (Dabur et al., 2019).
2. Ginger - used to treat a variety of ailments and is known for its anti-inflammatory properties (Sindhu et al., 2020).
3. Turmeric - used to treat a variety of ailments and is known for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties (Gupta et al., 2020).
